fullName: Contact Us Regression tests: submit contact form data and validate successful message

labels.name: story
labels.value: submit contact form data and validate successful message

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: submit contact form data and validate successful message

name: submit contact form data and validate successful message
description: As Customer, I can navigate to contact us page and submit my data.

steps.name: Given  User launches Jupitor toys shopping website
And  User navigates from Home page to Contact Page
When  User populate mandatory fields forename as "Eric Smith" and email as "ericsmith@gmail.com" and message as "My son loves to play Jupitor toys"
And  User clicks submit button on contact form
Then  Validate successful feedback message for user "Eric Smith"

parameters.name: message
parameters.value: My son loves to play Jupitor toys
